scene.name: injury
scene.line: His leg. It was twisted or something. He held it while he walked, and made these painful little sounds in his throat.
Oh, `how`? I don't know. I didn't ask. It would have been rude, I think.

scene.name: looking-for
scene.line: They were looking for Dr. Truman, but of course ... I had nothing to say. The man was hurt, you know.

scene.name: dr-truman
scene.line: He ... left, of course. We've talked about it before. He left and we don't know how, or when, or what happened to his charming house.

scene.name: dont-know
scene.line: Well, we just don't know. I suppose we never will.
